name: retention_period
description: Data retention period information for the table

fields.name: retention_time
fields.description: The retention time in days as specified in Snowflake

fields.name: retention_unit
fields.description: The unit of the retention period (e.g., DAYS, MONTHS, YEARS)

fields.name: is_retention_enabled
fields.description: Whether retention is enabled for this table

fields.name: last_updated
fields.description: When this retention information was last updated
